determinism_rule: Unknowns never cause runtime guessing; runtime uses only stored tags/patched tags.
notes: Keeps closed-world deterministic; prevents hallucinated tags.
resolution_output: Patch entry or adjudicated override stored in patch pack; unknown cleared for that snapshot.
review_action: Human selects: accept proposed tags OR add patch OR mark 'no tag'.
trigger_condition: RuleSpec cannot classify confidently OR facet ambiguity detected OR multiple conflicting matches.
unknown_record_fields: oracle_id, card_name, extractor_rule_ids, evidence_spans, proposed_tags, ambiguity_reason, snapshot_id, taxonomy_version

determinism_rule: Never infer missing tag; just mark unmet requirement.
resolution_output: Patch/RuleSpec update in next taxonomy version; optional patch for snapshot.
review_action: Queue review; build proceeds with conservative assumption (no credit).
trigger_condition: Backbone/access/protection requires a tag that is missing and marked unknown-critical.
